SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.socket_ref_user_id AS socketRefUserId, a.create_time AS createTime, b.nickname, b.avatar_file_id AS avatarFileId FROM base_live_room_user a LEFT JOIN base_user_info b ON b.id = a.user_id WHERE b.id IS NOT NULL AND a.id = #{id}
